entry.title: Genpt
entry.content: After two years of hard work, I’ve finished my project on generative modelling of point trajectories. The project page can be found here.
entry.summary: After two years of hard work, I’ve finished my project on generative modelling of point trajectories. The project page can be found here.

entry.title: Meta
entry.content: I recently accepted a Visiting Researcher position at Meta AI under Dr. Adriana Romero. I also recently got elected as a Lab Representative at Mila. Quite a lot of responsibilities this year :)
entry.summary: I recently accepted a Visiting Researcher position at Meta AI under Dr. Adriana Romero. I also recently got elected as a Lab Representative at Mila. Quite a lot of responsibilities this year :)

entry.title: Vitca
entry.content: Paper accepted at NeurIPS 2022: “Attention-based Neural Cellular Automata.” It’s been a while since my last publish! The camera-ready paper will be posted on arXiv soon, code will be shared on Github shortly afterward.
entry.summary: Paper accepted at NeurIPS 2022: “Attention-based Neural Cellular Automata.” It’s been a while since my last publish! The camera-ready paper will be posted on arXiv soon, code will be shared on Github shortly afterward.

entry.title: Frqnt
entry.summary: Awarded the FRQNT Doctoral (B2X) Research Scholarship.

entry.title: Big Update copy
entry.content: After 3 years of not touching this site, I’ve decided to update it. A lot of the missed “news” should be caught up through my CV. In the meantime, submit to the Machine Learning for Creativity and Design workshop I’m co-organizing for NeurIPS 2021. Due date is this Friday.
entry.summary: After 3 years of not touching this site, I’ve decided to update it. A lot of the missed “news” should be caught up through my CV. In the meantime, submit to the Machine Learning for Creativity and Design workshop I’m co-organizing for NeurIPS 2021. Due date is this Friday.
